attributes.action: maintain the link between Edgworth  village and Turton High School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under new proposals children from Edgworth village may no longer be guaranteed a place at the nearest High school  ie Turton School. This would mean children from Edgworth would be scattered across the district having to travel some distance past their local school in order to receive state funded secondary education. Time is short as the local primary school was only informed of this proposal at the beginning of this month and the closure date for objections to this  is March 9th 2007.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
